typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesCSV
MoviesCSV derive(Year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),
		title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> YearOnly
YearOnly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'targetnew',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
